@/dht2x-hygrometer.description: Read the temperature and humidity by the DHT21 or compatible (DHT21, DHT22, DHT33, DHT44, AM2301, HM2301, AM2302, AM2303, RHT02, RHT03, RHT04, RHT05) hygrometer sensor.

r1EHReikf.description: Divide by 10 to calculate percents. Divide by 100 to convert to [0, 1] range

Hk8tJZokG.content: The MSB in D2 stores temperature sign

@/dht2x-pack.description: Utility. Packs raw data from a DHT21 or higher thermometer into meaningful humidity and temperature.

HJMBihlj1G.description: Board port number the thermometer is connected to.
HJMBihlj1G.label: PORT

@/dhtxx-read-raw.description:
Utility. Reads raw data bytes from a DHTxx thermometer with one-wire interface.

Possible errors:
— Checksum failure
— Read timeout
— Initialization error
— Invalid port

description: Nodes to work with DHT11 or DHT21 sensors, or compatible sensors: RHT01, DHT22, DHT33, DHT44, AM2301, HM2301, AM2302, AM2303, RHT02, RHT03, RHT04, RHT05.
name: dht
